Question
========

Jody is taking two courses: English and History. Suppose the probability that she will get an 8 at the end of the semester is:_____. \ P(grade 8 on the English exam) = 0.70. P(grade 8 for the History exam) = 0.60. P(grade 8 on both the English and History exams) = 0.50 \ Are the events 'grade 8 for the English exam' and 'grade 8 for the History exam' are independent of each other?

Answerlist
----------

* Yes
* No

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Yes: Incorrect
* No: Correct
